text:
Slacker Radio - San Diego, CA - ONSITE (relocation offered on a case-by-case basis) - www.slacker.com

We're a music streaming company focused on a human-curated radio experience. If you love music and technology, this is the place for you!

We're looking for iOS and/or Android developers to work directly on the app in the App Store and Play Store.

If you're interested in learning more, please send me an email: acollins@slacker.com
